title: Top lane main who have to deal with no help but get blame for being bad LMAO
body:
I sit top lane and have no gank whatsoever from my jungler while I get gank by the enemy jungler....
I manage to play safe and avoid the gank or sometime outplay and trade 1 for 1 or kill both the top and jungler
------------
I sit top lane trying to hold my god damn turret vs both the enemy top and jungler and my Team blame me when my turret go down LMAO 
So I'm bad LOL 

I don't say nothing cus its pointless because the idiots will always think their right and I'm wrong
------------
Sorry Team, its all my fault

replies.body:
Even though your team-mates might not see it, there's value in having the enemy jungler visit your lane constantly. It leaves your jungler open to take dragon or safely gank other lanes. It also relieves pressure on the other lanes when the enemy jg is focusing on you. The best think you can do is adapt, ward, and try not to die so that you can just waste his time and get more value of the situation.

Try to ward river around the 3 minute mark. The deeper, the better. Also, getting an early pink is definitely worth the investment.

thats p much top lane for you
